name: CUSTOMER CREATOR
description:
Use the Random Customer Generator from the game Potions! to create and name your own unique character

When you click the Green Tick, a screenshot will be sent to me (the developer) which I will put up on the

 

Wall of Fame

Notes:

Please keep the names family friendly or I won't be able to put the character up!

Make sure that your zoom level is set to 100% for best results

If you have the game running in more than one window or tab, the screenshots might not send properly
